method: Grate the chuckles and cheese into a bowl
Add the quirkiness and mix well
Spread the chuckle and cheese mixture evenly on a tortilla
Fold the tortilla in half and press gently
Heat a skillet over medium heat
Cook the quesadilla for 2-3 minutes on each side until cheese is melted
Cut the quesadillas into wedges and serve with your favorite dipping sauce
